mapper.sql: RENTID, USERID, CARID, RENTALTIME, RETURNTIME, AMOUNT, STARTLNG, STARTLAT, ENDLNG, ENDLAT, ISPLAY, TRADE_NO
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from CARSHARINGDB.RENTINFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into CARSHARINGDB.RENTINFO
RENTID,
USERID,
CARID,
RENTALTIME,
RETURNTIME,
AMOUNT,
STARTLNG,
STARTLAT,
ENDLNG,
ENDLAT,
ISPLAY,
TRADE_NO,
#{rentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{carid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
to_date(#{rentaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
to_date(#{returntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{startlng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startlat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endlng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endlat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update CARSHARINGDB.RENTINFO
RENTID = #{record.rentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USERID = #{record.userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARID = #{record.carid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENTALTIME = #{record.rentaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RETURNTIME = #{record.returntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AMOUNT = #{record.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STARTLNG = #{record.startlng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STARTLAT = #{record.startlat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENDLNG = #{record.endlng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENDLAT = #{record.endlat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISPLAY = #{record.isplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_NO = #{record.tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update CARSHARINGDB.RENTINFO set RENTID = #{record.rentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, USERID = #{record.userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CARID = #{record.carid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RENTALTIME = #{record.rentaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RETURNTIME = #{record.returntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AMOUNT = #{record.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STARTLNG = #{record.startlng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARTLAT = #{record.startlat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDLNG = #{record.endlng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDLAT = #{record.endlat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISPLAY = #{record.isplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_NO = #{record.tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CARSHARINGDB.RENTINFO
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARID = #{carid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENTALTIME = to_date(#{rentaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
RETURNTIME = to_date(#{returntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STARTLNG = #{startlng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STARTLAT = #{startlat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENDLNG = #{endlng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENDLAT = #{endlat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISPLAY = #{isplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_NO = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RENTID = #{rentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update CARSHARINGDB.RENTINFO set USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CARID = #{carid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RENTALTIME = #{rentaltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RETURNTIME = #{returntime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STARTLNG = #{startlng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARTLAT = #{startlat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDLNG = #{endlng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENDLAT = #{endlat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISPLAY = #{isplay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_NO = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RENTID = #{rentid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
